packages.name: Social Media Starter
packages.description: Perfect for small businesses looking to establish their social media presence with essential content and management.

execSummary.summary: This starter package is designed to establish and maintain a consistent social media presence for your brand. We'll focus on the most impactful platforms for your audience, creating engaging content that drives awareness and engagement.
execSummary.objectives:
• Establish consistent brand presence on social media
• Increase brand awareness and reach
• Drive engagement with target audience
• Build community around your brand

scope.name: Social Media Management
scope.description: Complete social media management including content strategy, monthly content calendar creation, posting schedule, and community management.

scope.name: Content Creation
scope.description: Professional content creation including graphic design and basic video editing for social media platforms.

rateCard.name: Social Media Package
rateCard.description: Monthly social media management and content creation

team.name: Social Media Manager
team.description: Responsible for content strategy, scheduling, and community engagement

team.name: Content Designer
team.description: Creates graphics and edits video content for social media

packages.name: Digital Growth Package
packages.description: Comprehensive digital marketing solution with paid advertising and advanced content strategy for growing businesses.

execSummary.summary: The Digital Growth Package combines organic social media management with strategic paid advertising to accelerate your brand's growth. This comprehensive solution includes content creation, campaign management, and detailed analytics to maximize ROI.
execSummary.objectives:
• Increase brand visibility through organic and paid channels
• Drive qualified traffic to website/landing pages
• Generate leads and conversions through targeted campaigns
• Build a loyal community and customer base
• Establish thought leadership in your industry

scope.name: Social Media Management - Pro
scope.description: Enhanced social media management across multiple platforms with advanced content strategy and daily community management.

scope.name: Paid Advertising Management
scope.description: Strategic paid advertising campaigns on Meta platforms (Facebook & Instagram) including campaign setup, A/B testing, and ongoing optimization.

scope.name: Content Strategy & Planning
scope.description: Strategic content planning including audience research, competitor analysis, content pillar development, and editorial calendar creation.

rateCard.name: Social Media Package - Pro
rateCard.description: Enhanced social media management with multi-platform support

team.name: Social Media Manager
team.description: Lead strategist for social media presence and community engagement

team.name: Content Designer
team.description: Creates graphics, edits videos, and produces ad creatives

team.name: Paid Ads Specialist
team.description: Manages paid advertising campaigns and optimization

packages.name: Full-Service Premium
packages.description: Complete digital transformation package with comprehensive strategy, content production, advertising, and dedicated account management for enterprise clients.

execSummary.summary: Our Full-Service Premium package provides end-to-end digital marketing solutions for businesses seeking market leadership. This comprehensive program includes everything from brand strategy and content production to advanced advertising and conversion optimization, backed by a dedicated team and executive reporting.
execSummary.objectives:
• Establish market leadership through comprehensive digital presence
• Drive significant revenue growth through multi-channel campaigns
• Build a sustainable, scalable marketing ecosystem
• Achieve industry-leading engagement and conversion rates
• Develop long-term brand equity and customer loyalty

scope.name: Enterprise Social Media Management
scope.description: Full-scale social media management across all major platforms with real-time community management, influencer outreach, and reputation management.

scope.name: Video Production Suite
scope.description: Professional video production services including scripting, filming, editing, and post-production for high-quality brand content.

scope.name: Premium Paid Advertising
scope.description: Advanced multi-platform paid advertising with dynamic creative optimization, remarketing campaigns, and conversion rate optimization.

scope.name: Brand Strategy & Positioning
scope.description: Comprehensive brand strategy including market research, competitive analysis, brand positioning, and messaging framework development.

team.name: Account Director
team.description: Senior leadership ensuring strategic alignment and campaign success

team.name: Content Director
team.description: Oversees all content creation and video production

team.name: Performance Marketing Manager
team.description: Manages all paid campaigns and performance optimization

team.name: Graphic Designer
team.description: Creates visual assets and maintains brand consistency
